pack.pack_description: Dark, moody, high-end aesthetic with neon accents. Perfect for premium brands, luxury automotive, fashion, and tech companies seeking cinematic editorial vibes.

drop_announcement.headline: New Drop: Cinematic Luxury
drop_announcement.body: Dark, moody aesthetics with neon accents. For brands that demand attention. 10 premium templates ready to elevate your visual game.

templates.template_description: Square format product launch template with dramatic lighting and bold typography. Perfect for revealing new products with cinematic flair.
templates.seedream_prompt: Cinematic luxury product photography, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, deep black background with subtle texture, neon cyan and magenta accent glows reflecting on polished surface, premium product centered composition, bold sans-serif headline typography overlay, film grain texture, 8k resolution, ultra-detailed, cinematic color grading with crushed blacks, editorial photography style, moody atmosphere

templates.template_description: Vertical 9:16 story format with gritty behind-the-scenes energy. Perfect for showing process, craftsmanship, and raw luxury moments.
templates.seedream_prompt: Cinematic behind the scenes photography, vertical composition, dramatic side lighting with neon pink and gold accents, artisan hands working on luxury product, deep shadows, film grain overlay, smoke or haze atmosphere, golden hour mixed with neon lights, industrial luxury setting, shallow depth of field, cinematic color grading, moody editorial style, 8k resolution

templates.template_description: Wide 16:9 format for bold announcements and hot takes. High contrast typography with cinematic background elements.
templates.seedream_prompt: Cinematic wide format graphic design, dark charcoal background with subtle geometric patterns, bold condensed typography center, neon electric blue accent lines, film grain texture, smoke effects, dramatic lighting from one side, luxury car or product silhouette, high contrast black and gold color scheme, editorial poster style, 8k resolution, cinematic composition

templates.template_description: High-converting lead gen ad with luxury appeal. Dark aesthetic with clear value proposition and strong CTA.
templates.seedream_prompt: Luxury Facebook advertisement design, dark navy background with gold accents, premium product showcase left side, bold headline typography right side, neon glow effect on CTA button area, film grain texture overlay, professional studio lighting, exclusive VIP feeling, high-end magazine ad style, cinematic color grading, 8k resolution

templates.template_description: 8.5x11 print-ready flyer for luxury events, product launches, and exclusive experiences. Dramatic and bold.
templates.seedream_prompt: Luxury event flyer design, portrait orientation, deep black background with gold and neon pink accents, large bold typography as focal point, event details in clean sans-serif, cinematic lighting effects, film grain texture, smoke and atmospheric haze, VIP exclusive event feeling, high contrast editorial layout, print-ready 300dpi, 8k resolution

editable_fields.label: Description
editable_fields.default: An exclusive evening of luxury and innovation.

templates.template_description: Premium networking business card with cinematic dark aesthetic. Bold, memorable, and unmistakably luxury.
templates.seedream_prompt: Premium business card design, dark matte black background, gold foil embossed text, neon blue accent line, minimalist layout, bold sans-serif typography, film grain texture, luxury brand identity, high-end print finish, spot UV coating effect, 3.5x2 inches, cinematic color grading, 8k resolution

templates.template_description: High-impact 16:9 thumbnail that demands clicks. Bold text, dramatic imagery, and undeniable stopping power.
templates.seedream_prompt: Cinematic YouTube thumbnail, 16:9 format, dramatic lighting with neon pink and cyan, shocked or excited face on one side, bold 3D text on other side, dark background with smoke effects, high contrast, film grain texture, glowing edges, clickbait style composition, viral thumbnail design, 8k resolution, cinematic color grading

templates.template_description: LinkedIn-native format that balances professionalism with bold cinematic style. Stand out in the feed.
templates.seedream_prompt: LinkedIn professional post design, 1.91:1 aspect ratio, dark sophisticated background, clean bold typography, subtle gold accents, professional headshot silhouette or abstract luxury element, film grain texture, executive level aesthetic, cinematic lighting, premium business feel, 8k resolution

editable_fields.label: Quote/Headline
editable_fields.default: Excellence is not an act, but a habit.

templates.template_description: Multi-slide Instagram carousel for storytelling. Dramatic sequence that builds anticipation and engagement.
templates.seedream_prompt: Cinematic Instagram carousel template, square format, series of 3-5 connected frames, dark continuity background, neon accent progression from cyan to magenta to gold across slides, bold typography that builds story, film grain texture, cinematic transitions, editorial magazine spread feel, 8k resolution

templates.template_description: Wide 3:1 billboard format for maximum street impact. Bold, readable from distance, unforgettable.
templates.seedream_prompt: Cinematic billboard advertisement, ultra-wide 3:1 format, massive bold typography, dark moody background with city skyline silhouette, neon pink and electric blue light trails, luxury product hero shot, film grain texture, dramatic fog or rain, night scene, high contrast for outdoor visibility, iconic brand moment, 8k resolution
